dataset_id: BOREAS AFM-12 1-km AVHRR Seasonal Land Cover Classification
title: BOREAS AFM-12 1-km AVHRR Seasonal Land Cover Classification
summary: This regional land cover data set was developed as part of a multitemporal 1-km AVHRR land cover analysis approach that was used as the basis for regional land cover mapping, fire disturbance-regeneration, and multiresolution land cover scaling studies in the boreal forest ecosystem of central Canada (Steyaert et al., 1997).
